body:
Magnificent Community of Ladybug!



This is a reminder that we will be kicking off a 2-month-long series of webinars starting this upcoming Thursday, March 9th.  Each webinar will last for 2 hours and will cover one of the latest and greatest topics from recent development.  Although the webinars will be happening each Thursday around 12:30 Eastern Standard Time, registration will give you indefinite access to recordings of the webinars so that you can reference them when the time comes to apply them on your work!



**The grand list of workshops is as follows:**

[1 - High-Quality Graphics, Visualizations and Animations with Ladyb...](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/6794516044454543874?tz=Europe/London)

[2 - Brute Force Parametric Energy Modeling and Sensitivity Analyses...](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/4855769181429717762?tz=Europe/London)

[3 - Wintertime Indoor Thermal Comfort Visualization - Eliminating P...](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/7632870570889619970?tz=Europe/London)

[4 - Summertime Indoor Thermal Comfort Visualization - Setpoints and...](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/6748379437041510658?tz=Europe/London)

[5 - Condensation Modeling with HoneybeeApril 20th, 12:30 PM EST](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/6047173593008781826?tz=Europe/London)

[6 - Urban Heat Island Modeling with DragonflyApril 27th, 12:30 PM EST](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/5727370740465560322?tz=Europe/London)

[7 - Expanding Your Climate Data Sources with DragonflyMay 4th, 12:3...](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/6999589256686122498?tz=Europe/London)

[8 - CFD Simulation with OpenFOAM, Rhino/Grasshopper and Butterfly (...](https://attendee.gototraining.com/42b11/register/5689927973481257985?tz=Europe/London)



This series will have a similar arc as the one in the Fall, starting with basic topics and moving to advanced ones as we progress down the list.  The first one will be accessible to all users regardless of prior experience and all of the workshops listed here will cover topics for which there is currently no tutorial video content. Hope that you can attend!
